heroSection.title: Brasper Transfers
heroSection.description: Send Soles, Dollars, and Reais to Brazil and Peru at the best exchange rate and with a premium fee for your transfers!

projectSection.title: International Transfers
projectSection.item1Description: Depending on the method used, transfers from soles to reais can take from a few hours to several business days. Specialized exchange houses and fintech platforms often offer faster processing times compared to traditional banks.
projectSection.item2Description: It is essential to choose an entity regulated by the relevant financial authorities, both in Peru and Brazil, to ensure the protection of your funds.

servicesSection.title: Latest services
servicesSection.subtitle: We provide the best exchange rates for transfers
servicesSection.service1Description: A bank transfer is a process by which money is moved from one bank account to another.
servicesSection.service2Description: In the context of an exchange house or an entity that deals in currency exchange, a quotation refers to the value or rate at which one currency can be exchanged for another at a given time.
servicesSection.service3Description: Fast and secure shipments with Brasper transfers.
servicesSection.service4Description: The services we provide are not only secure transfers but also offer advice and financial insights.
servicesSection.service5Description: With us, you will have confidence in improving your transfers and we offer you a discount on your first transfer with us.

workProcessSection.title: Our simple guide
workProcessSection.subtitle: Buy or sell your Reais, Soles, or Dollars in 4 simple steps
workProcessSection.step1Description: Get a quote and enter the amount you want to exchange.
workProcessSection.step2Description: Register and make the transfer to the BrasPer Transferencias account and send us the proof of operation.
workProcessSection.step3Description: Receive your exchange. We will deposit the money into the registered account.
workProcessSection.step4Description: If you were satisfied with our service, recommend us to more people.
